title: I'm a student with an expected of 36-38 points in IB. What would be the best university I can apply for theology or philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: I also did IB, and I’m sure your school had a week where University’s would come in and try to show off what they can offer. But this one speaker really hit hard, because everybody always talked about Ivy League University’s, or ‘popular’ ones because of TV shows, etc. She simply just said, look for a uni that suits your needs, does the campus inspire you? Do you like the facilities offered there? Do you like the way they teach/expectations. Rather look for a school that will make you want to study, not for one where you feel like you have to be perfect. Because that’s how most kids drop out. (Just my opinion! I thought what she said made a lot of kids second guess their choice)
